definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Jos 9:4 skin-bottle, skin (√ unknown; NH [[נוֹד]]; As. nâdu, Dl:HWB 438; Aram. [[נוֹדָא]]);—´[[נ]] abs. Ps 119:83; cstr. Ju Jdg 4:19, 1Sa 16:20; sf. [[נאׁדְֶָ]] Ps 56:9; pl. [[נאׁדוֹת]] Jos 9:4, Jos 9:13; —skin, [[יַיִן]] ´[[נ]] Jos 9:4, Jos 9:13, 1Sa 16:20; [[הֶחָלָב]] ´[[נ]] Ju Jdg 4:19; for tears Ps 56:9 (fig.; v. Che); [[בְּקִיטוֹר]] ´[[נ]] i.e. shrivelled and useless Ps 119:83 (in sim.; cf. [De] Che Schu De Witt We > as thrust aside, out of the way Now (in Hup), cf. De, or as black and wrinkled outwardly, while retaining the choice wine within Bae, after Rosenm. Hup).—Vid. Winer:RWB. Art. Schlauch Kmp:Ri HWB id.
